The [93mprecisely[0m [93mcontrolled[0m [93mZnTe[0m ([93m111[0m)-[93mZnO[0m ([93m101[0m) [93mheterointerface[0m [93minduces[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mredistribution[0m through [93minterfacial[0m [93mpolarization[0m [93meffects[0m, [93menabling[0m [93msimultaneous[0m [93moptimization[0m of [93mpolysulfide[0m [93mconversion[0m [93mkinetics[0m and [93mLi[0m + [93mdeposition[0m [93muniformity[0m. The [93mbuilt[0m-in [93mpolarization[0m [93melectric[0m [93mfield[0m [93moriginates[0m from [93mspontaneous[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mtransfer[0m between [93mZnTe[0m ([93m111[0m) and [93mZnO[0m ([93m101[0m) [93mfacets[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93melectronic[0m [93mstructures[0m, as [93mconfirmed[0m by [93mdensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m [93mcalculations[0m. [93mElectrochemical[0m [93mcharacterization[0m [93mdemonstrates[0m [93mexceptional[0m [93mcycling[0m [93mstability[0m of the [93massembled[0m [93mLSBs[0m, [93mexhibiting[0m an [93multralow[0m [93mcapacity[0m [93mdecay[0m [93mrate[0m of [93m0[0m.[93m047[0m% [93mper[0m [93mcycle[0m over [93m1000[0m [93mcycles[0m at [93m1[0m [93mC[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, [93mLi[0m//[93mLi[0m [93msymmetric[0m [93mcells[0m [93mmaintain[0m [93mstable[0m [93moperation[0m for [93m700[0m [93mh[0m at [93m1[0m [93mmA[0m [93mcm[0m -[93m2[0m with [93mminimal[0m [93mpolarization[0m. This [93mwork[0m [93mestablishes[0m an [93meffective[0m [93mstrategy[0m for [92mdesigning[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mperformance[0m [93mLSBs[0m through [93mcrystal[0m [93mfacet[0m-[93mengineered[0m [93mpolarization[0m [93mfields[0m, [93mproviding[0m [93mvaluable[0m [93mguidance[0m for [93mdeveloping[0m [93mstable[0m [93menergy[0m [93mstorage[0m [92msystems[0m.
- [93mLimitations[0m of [93mcrystal[0m [93mfield[0m [93mtheory[0m [93mapplied[0m to [93msedimentary[0m [92msystems[0m
- The [93mHidden[0m [92mArchitecture[0m of [93mInertia[0m: [93mStakeholder[0m [93mPerspectives[0m on the [93mMost[0m [93mPressing[0m [93mChallenges[0m in [93mPharmacy[0m [93mEducation[0m.: [93mObjective[0m: The [93mobjectives[0m of this [93mstudy[0m were to ([93m1[0m)[93midentify[0m [93mconvergent[0m/[93mdivergent[0m [93mchallenges[0m in [93mpharmacy[0m [93meducation[0m, ([93m2[0m)[93mdevelop[0m a [92mmodel[0m to [93mdemonstrate[0m how these [93mchallenges[0m [33mlead[0m to [93mstagnation[0m in [93mpharmacy[0m [93meducation[0m, ([93m3[0m)[93midentify[0m [92msystemic[0m [93mdrivers[0m/[93mrestraining[0m [93mforces[0m that [93minfluence[0m [91mchange[0m, and ([93m4[0m)[95mexplore[0m [93mperceived[0m [93madvantages[0m/[93mdisadvantages[0m of [93meducational[0m [93mtransformation[0m. [93mMethods[0m: This [93mqualitative[0m [93mstudy[0m [93mused[0m [93mgrounded[0m [93mtheory[0m and [93mthematic[0m [93manalysis[0m to [93manalyze[0m [93mdata[0m from [93m27[0m [93mfocus[0m [93mgroups[0m [93mcomprising[0m [93meight[0m [93mstakeholder[0m [93mgroups[0m: [93mstudents[0m, [93mfaculty[0m, [93mpreceptors[0m, [93mdeans[0m, [93mhealthcare[0m [93mprofessionals[0m, [93mpayors[0m, [93mprofessional[0m [93morganization[0m [33mleaders[0m, and [93mpractice[0m [93mtransformation[0m [33mleaders[0m. [93mDiscussions[0m were [93mtranscribed[0m, [93mcoded[0m, and [93manalyzed[0m [93miteratively[0m to [93midentify[0m [93mthemes[0m, [93mstakeholder[0m [93mconvergence[0m/[93mdivergence[0m, and [93mperceived[0m [93mtrade[0m-[93moffs[0m [93mrelated[0m to [93meducational[0m [93mreform[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mFour[0m [93minterconnected[0m [93mthemes[0m were [93midentified[0m: a [93mpersistent[0m [93mcompetency[0m-[93mpractice[0m [93mgap[0m; a [93mfragmented[0m [93mprofessional[0m [93midentity[0m; [93mrising[0m [93mresource[0m and [93msustainability[0m [93mchallenges[0m; and [93mstrong[0m [93mresistance[0m to [91mchange[0m. These [93mthemes[0m were [93mmapped[0m into [93mtwo[0m [93mreinforcing[0m [93mcycles[0m, the [93mEducational[0m [93mInertia[0m [93mCycle[0m and the [93mProfessional[0m [93mIdentity[0m [93mCycle[0m, [93mshowing[0m how [93moutdated[0m [93mcurricula[0m, [93munclear[0m [93mrole[0m [93mdefinitions[0m, and [93minstitutional[0m [93mobstacles[0m [93mcontinue[0m to [93mcreate[0m [93mmisalignment[0m. [93mCross[0m-[93mstakeholder[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93mshared[0m [93mconcerns[0m but [93mvaried[0m [93mpriorities[0m, with [93mstudents[0m and [93mpreceptors[0m [93memphasizing[0m [93mpractice[0m [93mreadiness[0m, while [93mfaculty[0m and [93mdeans[0m [93mhighlighting[0m [93mburnout[0m and [93mresource[0m [93mconstraints[0m. A [93mqualitative[0m [93mforce[0m [93mfield[0m [93manalysis[0m [93midentified[0m [93mkey[0m [93mdriving[0m and [93mrestraining[0m [93mforces[0m, while an [93madvantage[0m-[93mdisadvantage[0m [93mmatrix[0m [93moutlined[0m [93mperceived[0m [93mtrade[0m-[93moffs[0m of [93mproposed[0m [93mreforms[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mcompetency[0m-[93mbased[0m [93meducation[0m, [93mexperiential[0m [93mexpansion[0m, and [93mcurricular[0m [93mredesign[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mDespite[0m [93mwidespread[0m [93mrecognition[0m of [93mnecessary[0m [93mreforms[0m, [93mpharmacy[0m [93meducation[0m [93mfaces[0m [92msystemic[0m [93minertia[0m. [93mStakeholder[0m [93minsights[0m [93maffirm[0m the [93murgent[0m [93mneed[0m for [93mcoordinated[0m, [93mstrategic[0m [93mefforts[0m to [93mrealign[0m [93mcurricula[0m, [93msupport[0m [93mfaculty[0m, [93mfoster[0m [93midentity[0m [93mformation[0m, and [93mmodernize[0m [93massessment[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93moffer[0m a [93mgrounded[0m [92mframework[0m for [93mtransforming[0m [93mpharmacy[0m [93meducation[0m to be [93mmore[0m [93mresponsive[0m [93mtoday[0m and [93mready[0m for [93mtomorrow[0m.
